component.name: 4-digit Random Number Generator
component.summary: Get random numbers using middle square method!

description.p: This app uses John von Neumann's middle square method to generate 4-digit random numbers. It's a simple method that can be done on pen and paper.
To get the next random number, the current random number is squared. This squared number can have at most 8 digits. The next number is just the middle 4 digits.
In this app the initial random number is calculated from current unix time.
